title: 32: Nightmare Roommates and Craig Conant
itunes:title: 32: Nightmare Roommates and Craig Conant
description:
This week The Broads are joined by the hilarious comedian Craig Conant. They discuss nightmare roommates, drugs, oatmeal in Ziploc bags, Jess’ inappropriate snooping, Craig’s Schwinn bike, Bekah’s bed bugs, and barely give any advice but laugh a lot. 
***SCENTBIRD: Go to Scentbird.com/ CHATTY and use the code CHATTY for 50% off your first month.
***ARTICLE: Go to article.com/chatty to get $50 off your first purchase of $100 or more.
*** FAB FIT FUN: Go to fabfitfun.com (http://fabfitfun.com/) and using the coupon code CHATTY for $10 off your first box.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
